titles.title: To amend the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1996 to expand the boundaries of the heritage corridor to include Georgetown, Berkeley, and Saluda Counties, South Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 9/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1996 to expand the boundaries of the Corridor to include the counties of Georgetown, Berkeley, and Saluda.
